page.title: 14MY DAY
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.30 and have my breakfast, which consists of a bowl of cereal and two pieces of toast with butter and jam. Then I have a wash and brush my teeth. At 8.00 I put on my uniform, get my sandwiches and kiss Mum goodbye. The school bus comes along at about 8.45. At school I meet my friends. The school day starts with Register, Assembly, A-Day mental arithmetic and Scottish Maths. After play we have French, then carry on with a story we are writing. The afternoon starts with Reading and Topic work, and then we go swimming in our school pool. At 3.30 I go home. At home I watch television or play with my friends in the village of Ripe where I live. I have tea, perhaps liver and bacon, about 7.00pm. I go to bed at 8.00 and read. By about 9 o'clock I am asleep.
